Is there any reason that nothing is capitalized in the id3 tags? 
Other than that solid upload, thanks for the quality stuff.

caps? you are really bitching about capitalization in the tags? wow... There are no caps in the ID3 tags because i don't like my tags capped, it doesn't look good on my car stereo... tell you what get id3 Tag-it (http://www.id3-tagit.de/) 

you can change the capitalization to your hearts desire in one fell swoop, even has a wizard to change tags and file names by rule... knock yourself out.

thanks for the upload :D
TBK are awesome, and, they come from my home town.

New fan (from about 20 minutes ago, and the first note). (don't yell at me) A friend mentioned them a while back, and I didn't follow up, but then he didn't really explain. So don't yell at me.
Thanks for the upload, because if you like them, you'll want everything. And this will be enough to keep me busy for a while. Just don't yell at me.
And thanks for the high bit rates. I can't understand why people upload at lower rates. WTF? Yes, I'm yelling, I like to yell.

My buddy introduced me to this band, whenever they come to town we are going!
http://thepiratebay.org/user/soylentw/

Just to say, I already have All of these albums, but can't be bothered to rip them, so am downloading them from here. 

If you also like them put your hand in your pocket. No other band today is as deserving.

Cheers.
